bibl.title: Redating the Inscription of El-Moallaqa.
bibl.note: Cairo, Coptic Museum, Inv. 753. Carved wooden lintel from the Coptic church of El-Moallaqa in Old Cairo, which combines a lengthy Greek inscription [I. Lefebvre 69] with two pictorial scenes from the life of Christ. The correct date is 7.V.735.
bibl.seg: MacCoull Leslie S.B., Redating the Inscription of El-Moallaqa.

Cairo, Coptic Museum, Inv. 753. Carved wooden lintel from the Coptic church of El-Moallaqa in Old Cairo, which combines a lengthy Greek inscription [I. Lefebvre 69] with two pictorial scenes from the life of Christ. The correct date is 7.V.735.
